Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Median overall survival time was 10 . 2 months [ 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) : 8 . 7 - 11 . 6 ] , and median progression - free survival time was 7 . 6 months ( 95 % CI : 4 . 4 - 10 . 9 ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Median overall survival time: This refers to the time period after which 50% of the patients with a certain disease have survived. In this context, the disease is not explicitly stated but can be inferred from the context.
2. Median progression-free survival time: This refers to the time period after treatment during which there is no worsening of the disease. Again, the disease is not explicitly stated but can be inferred from the context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Median overall survival time was 10 . 2 months [ 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) : 8 . 7 - 11 . 6 ] , and median progression - free survival time was 7 . 6 months ( 95 % CI : 4 . 4 - 10 . 9 ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Median overall survival time: This refers to the time period after which 50% of the patients in a study have survived. It is not a chemical entity.
2. 95 % confidence interval (CI): A confidence interval is a range of values that is likely to include an unknown population parameter. It is not a chemical entity.
3. 8 . 7 - 11 . 6: This is the lower and upper limit of the confidence interval for median overall survival time. It is not a chemical entity.
4. Median progression-free survival time: This refers to the time period after which 50% of the patients in a study have stopped progressing in their disease. It is not a chemical entity.
5. 4 . 4 - 10 . 9: This is the lower and upper limit of the confidence interval for median progression-free survival time. It is not a chemical entity.
